wikipedia_page.main: Liam Anthony Horsted (born 29 October 1985) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger.

response: He signed a two-year contract with Portsmouth in August 2004 following a trial with the club. He moved on loan to Oxford United in March 2006, along with fellow Portsmouth player Liam Horsted. He was one of 7 player released by Portsmouth in May 2006 following the expiry of their contracts.
